hero.title: Prefiguration Lab
hero.tagline: A research collective exploring how organizations can prefigure more sustainable, just futures.
hero.body: We study practices, technologies, and forms of organizing that anticipate the world we want to build.

projectsCopy: Our research projects explore how organizational practices shape possible futures.

projects.title: Clearview AI & Surveillance
projects.blurb: We examine the implications of facial recognition technologies in everyday organizational contexts, focusing on power, consent, and accountability.

projects.title: Sustainability & Prefiguration
projects.blurb: We explore how organizations experiment with sustainable practices today to prefigure low-carbon, socially just futures.
